attributes.documentation: @title Controllable implements access control functionality based on an external list of controllers.
attributes.name: Controllable

attributes.documentation:
@dev Constructor initializes the controller contract object.
 @param _controller address of the controller contract.
@dev Checks if message sender is a controller.
attributes.name: onlyController

attributes.documentation: @return true if the provided account is a controller.
attributes.name: isController

attributes.documentation:
@dev Changes the address of the controller contract.
 @param _controller address of the new controller contract.
attributes.name: newController

attributes.documentation: @title The Controller interface provides access to an external list of controllers.
attributes.name: IController

attributes.documentation: @title Controller stores a list of controller addresses that can be used for authentication in other contracts.
attributes.name: Controller

attributes.documentation:
@dev Constructor initializes the list of controllers with the provided address.
 @param _account address to add to the list of controllers.
@dev Checks if message sender is a controller.
attributes.name: onlyController

attributes.documentation:
@dev Add a new controller to the list of controllers.
 @param _account address to add to the list of controllers.
attributes.name: addController

attributes.documentation:
@dev Remove a controller from the list of controllers.
 @param _account address to remove from the list of controllers.
attributes.name: removeController

attributes.documentation: @return true if the provided account is a controller.
attributes.name: isController

attributes.documentation: @return the current number of controllers.
attributes.name: controllerCount

attributes.documentation: @dev Internal-only function that adds a new controller.
attributes.name: _addController

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "provided account is already a controller"

attributes.type: literal_string "provided account is already a controller"
attributes.value: provided account is already a controller

attributes.documentation: @dev Internal-only function that removes an existing controller.
attributes.name: _removeController

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "provided account is not a controller"

attributes.type: literal_string "provided account is not a controller"
attributes.value: provided account is not a controller

attributes.documentation: @title Resolver returns the controller contract address.
attributes.name: IResolver

attributes.documentation: @title Resolver implements on-chain contract address resolution.
attributes.name: Resolver

attributes.documentation:
@return the address of the target contract.
 @notice this function is compatible with the oraclize contract API.
attributes.name: getAddress

attributes.documentation:
@dev Sets the address of the target contract.
 @param _target new address of the target contract.
attributes.name: setAddress
